title: TargetCoverageSummary
description: Coverage metrics summary for a single test coverage target

targetRef.description: ID of the testing.testcoveragetarget this summary covers

sketchCount.description: Total number of TestCaseSketch nodes for this target (design-time count; superset of implementedCount)

implementedCount.description: Number of sketches with a concrete test case implementation (must be ≤ sketchCount; superset of automatedCount)

automatedCount.description: Number of implemented test cases that are automated (must be ≤ implementedCount)

coveragePercentage.description: Percentage of coverage requirements with at least one implemented test case sketch (0–100)
